text: Konstantin Lokhanov (Russian: Константин Игоревич Лоханов; born 1998; nicknamed Kostya)https://fie.org/athletes/34636. Retrieved 2024-06-12is a Russian sabre fencer living in San Diego, California, in the United States. In 2021, he competed in sabre at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.https://yle.fi/a/74-20092232. Retrieved 2024-06-12 Because of the Russian invasion of Ukraine, he defected to the United States. He said: "I decided I could no longer live in a country that kills innocent Ukrainians." He became a member of USA Fencing. ==Sources== Category:Russian sportspeople Category:Fencers Category:1998 births Category:Living people
title: Konstantin Lokhanov
